steps.title: 3 Steps to USDT in Your Account
steps.subtitle: We have made the connection and setup process as smooth and fast as possible, and our support team is ready to assist with any questions

step1.title: Add the bot and set the ad frequency
step1.text: Connect a bot or channel via API, assign an admin, and choose the allowed ad frequency in the channel

step2.title: The ad is published for 24 hours
step2.text: The post remains active for 24 hours after moderation. After this period, the post is automatically removed

step3.title: Payment in USDT every 24 hours
step3.text: We send payments for views (CPM) to your AdsGram wallet every 24 hours
